channel.title: Help with spawnnpc(int, int, int)

item.title: Help with spawnnpc(int, int, int)
item.dc:creator: @Bob13524 Bob13524
item.description:
@Bob13524 wrote:

[center]Hello, atm i’m creating a client. It has the basic code of spawnobject(int, int, int).

public void spawnobjects(int i, int j, int k) { int l = (i >> 3) - 6; int i1 = (j >> 3) - 6; int j1 = i - l * 8; int k1 = j - i1 * 8; int l1 = 0; int i2 = j1 + (l1 >> 4 & 7); int j2 = k1 + (l1 & 7); byte byte0 = 10; int k2 = 0; int l2 = anIntArray1177[byte0]; if(i2 >= 0 && j2 >= 0 && i2 < 104 && j2 < 104) { method130(404, -1, k, k2, l2, j2, byte0, anInt918, i2, 0); } }

I would like to make a void for spawnnpc(int, int, int). I don’t have the correct int or byte. If someone could post me a spawnnpc void from there client that would be great.
Thanks.[/center]
